name: d-analytics
body: d-analytics ======== Google Analytics component for Derby.js. Records a pageview in Google Analytics for the page where component is added. # Usage First of make sure to install d-share through npm `npm install d-analytics` ## Including ```js app.use(require('d-analytics')); ``` ## In template ```html ``` Note: You must replace the value UA-XXXX-Y with the web property ID listed in the management interface within Google Analytics.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
